results.name: The First Step (The Wizard And The Frog)

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core i3 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 780
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core i5-4690 3.50GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
